website_summaries.verdict: For heavy sleepers, this clock radio’s multiple alarm options, including graduated light, could make it indispensable.
pros: Built-in light’s gradual brightening provides added wake-up assurance
Can also be used as a nightlight thanks to dimmer switch
Radio reception is clear, and speaker sound is good for its small size
cons: Control buttons are hard to find in the dark
Light is too bright for some
Using snooze button can shift the alarm clock’s time, requiring a reset

customer_reviews.title: Love the light, dislike the sounds.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sunrise function of this alarm clock. Waking up naturally is so much nicer. I'm not a fan of the alarm sounds though. Not at all natural. Seems like they could've done a much better job there. Directions are kind of a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Milr

customer_reviews.title: Zero functionality.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this alarm clock only has 1 volume button (you can only keep turning it louder and louder until it cycles through back to the lowest volume setting) should tell you all you need to know about the functionality, or really, extreme lack thereof, for this alarm clock. I would also try to set the light to come on at 7 am in the morning. With the current time correctly set, the alarm did not go off at the intended time, but it would turn on about 10 minutes after I had finally fallen asleep though. This is not a good alarm clock, I have no idea why it has good reviews. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This clock was difficult to follow the directions and the print was so very small. Contacted the company and it took a long time to obtain directions in plain English that was large enough to read without a magnifying glass. The concept seems good but you have to set the time nearly 30 minutes before the actual alarm goes off. This product needs a lot of tweaking before it will be of much use to the general population. It was a waste of money for us, and we are a college educated family. It certainly is NOT for senior citizens for don't purchase it for Grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: happyhubby

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. We get up when it's still dark out ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. We get up when it's still dark out and it's obviously tough to get out of bed when the whole world is dark. The light turns on 30 minutes before the alarm goes off, which is great to help get me up gently and out of bed. Be warned, though, the first few times I opened my eyes and it looked like daylight in my room, I had a heart attack thinking I had slept late, but it was just the clock.
customer_reviews.author: ArielZ

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this alarm clock. However, the alarm display is so bright that I could practically read by the light it emits. When I turn the number display off the alarm will not sound in the morning. I ended up taping a piece of heavy paper over the display. The light portion of the clock works well, but is difficult to turn off. The clock usually rolls away when I grab it in the morning to try and shut the wake up light off. The noise alarm will continue to go off if I don't hit the correct button. The clock buttons look nice but are difficult to use. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Britta S.

customer_reviews.title: Withstands a father's frustration.
customer_reviews.text: This works as a nice soft nightlight for my daughter. It's not nearly as glaring as a regular bulb or tiny nightlight. The wake up and sleep lights work well. Now if my daughter would just wake her ass up on her own like she's supposed to. It takes a minute to figure out how to program it. Durable, too. I got pissed and threw this thing on the ground. The front translucent piece popped off. I put it right back on, and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: No that great. Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: No that great. Hard to use. Kind of flimsy and not very loud, but if you wake up easily...then I would recommend it. Just didn't work well for me and I ended up donating mine to goodwill and just getting the philips hue lights in my bedroom with the app on my phone and a Iphone docking station with loud speaker built-in. The hue lights can be set to light up your entire room in any color your like, at any time you like, which I find is better, but the hue lights are also upward of $100-150 dollars for the set up and this things was much less.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Great for waking up more naturally!
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it says. As someone who needs light to help wake up, this is the perfect alarm clock for me. It was a little tricky to set up due to the sequencing of the buttons, but not so hard that it's not doable within a few minutes of toying around with it and the instructions. The brightness of the light is rather remarkable and really helps with getting me out of bed with ease. I would recommend this to anyone who has difficulty getting out of bed without a little help from some light. It also aesthetically looks nice on my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: C.Jenney

customer_reviews.title: Makes waking up SO MUCH EASIER.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this alarm clock. Not only does it double as a light for my nightstand AND offer soothing sleep sounds, but it also gradually lights up when it is closer to your alarm time. This makes it SO MUCH EASIER to wake up when you have to do so before the sun. It has honestly completely changed my mornings, as I gradually wake with the light rather than being abruptly yanked from sleep by an annoying sound. This also has an alarm, which can play whatever sound you set, but I typically find that I am awake before that alarm can go off due to the light.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is definitely adequate to wake up to gently
customer_reviews.text: wow this clock lights up the entire dark room and allows me to wake gently. I am still working with the right settings since the brightness occurs gradually over a 1/2 hour. I set the alarm for 6 and it was getting bright in my room by 5;45 (too early for me). There are other options to wake also, nice nature sounds or FM radio. Definitely a great buy, it's sleek and not too large for my small nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it got a little brighter
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars- the alarm sounds are nice. I like how adjustable the volume is and how you can turn the clock display off at night. It doesn't get quite as bright when the alarm goes off as I thought it would. Perhaps that's something that you have to pay more money for. I do not use the radio feature at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: I sleep better at night in a pitch black room (its better for your health!) but have trouble waking up in the morning! This allowed me to get both a good nights rest in the dark (you can turn off the clock light) and wake up to 'almost' natural light. great product.
customer_reviews.author: melanie09

customer_reviews.title: Great for waking up when it's dark outside!
customer_reviews.text: I got this alarm clock because it was getting harder and harder to wake up in the morning when it was still dark outside/in my room. The alarm clock gradually gets lighter until it actually goes off. Somehow it's a lot easier to get up with a little light than a pitch black room. The alarm itself is quite relaxing at first and then gets progressively louder and brighter. I hit snooze a few times still, but it ultimately is a nicer way to wake up. I'm also no longer sleeping through my alarms and being late to things anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Won’t go to full light at alarm time if sounds are off
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviews have mentioned, my light rarely goes to full brightness at alarm time. I’ve tried resetting as suggested by the manufacturer in the Q&A section, but it only seems to go to full brightness if I have the alarm sounds on. As I can’t stand the sounds and never use them, this bug has made this light useless to me. It served its purpose as a cheap wake up light to test out the concept and figure out it would work for me. But I’m upgrading to one of the pricier name brand Philips one for something that will meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlín Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it - helps me sleep more deeply.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My doctor recommended getting a sunrise alarm - I hate regular alams, too jarring! Because I don't use an alarm, I wasn't sleeping deeply, waking up a lot. This wakes me up in a calm, relaxing way. Bird song option is a little aggressive - not going to be mistaken for real birds outside, but I am usually in the shower before it starts.
customer_reviews.author: otisandtess

customer_reviews.title: Morning made possible
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Made waking up at unholy hours of the morning more tolerable. Always been a night shifter till recently. So my body naturally wakes with the rising sun. This simulated a sun rise that made getting up for 4am shifts a little easier. Fairly easy to use, but the sound for the alarm was hard to set. Even when set to the radio setting and the volume all the way down, on occasion it would still sound. So adding a feature to have the light only without a noise would make it way nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for so many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old in the winter (when the sun does not come up for HOURS after we up in the morning). She kept waking at 3 am or so and thinking it was morning and allowed to get up. We set this to gradually get brighter at 6:30-7 so if she opened her eyes she would know she is ALLOWED to get up. No sounds or anything. We also use this as a night light because you can adjust the brightness and it’s super subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great cost-effective alternative
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this alarm clock for almost 2 years and it has been a life saver during the dark and dreary Seattle winters. Hasn't broken down on me yet, and also does not overheat. Great alternative for the pricy Philips sunrise alarm clock. The buttons on the face are not backlit, so they are a bit hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Radio doesn’t work. Not one station comes in, just static. Stretched out the antenna but no reception. Difficult to set time/alarms. Skips over numbers, etc. Waste of money. Unfortunately I didn’t try and use it until 2 yrs after I bought it so I’m out of luck. I see this item is no longer available....a good thing! So sorry I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: Best Way To Wake Up!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this alarm clock. Not only does it wake you up in such a pleasant and gentle way but it really WAKES YOU UP. I rarely hit the snooze button anymore with it. The multi colored light are so beautiful and the speaker and sound quality of the radio on it is top notch! This is one of my favorite amazon purchases, I highly recommend this little beauty! 💫 ⏰ 💫
customer_reviews.author: AlinaSkates

customer_reviews.title: Had potential, but doesn't deliver
customer_reviews.text: The clock works. However, it does not lighten gradually. It has 3 different light intensities. Each one clicks on as the time passes. So it's not a gradual wake up for me. Also, the controls are a bit tough to figure out. I also can't turn off the current alarm once the light starts to tick on. Have to wait for the full cycle to be complete before I can turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts Only

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT LCD & No CE or UL certification - fire risk
customer_reviews.text: LCD is not passive like the Phillips model and is very bright even in low light. No CE or UL certification - fire risk and cheap Chinese shadow company. Buy something from a real vetted brand that has the right consumer protection certifications.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Can have improvements
customer_reviews.text: Pretty glad to have this product! I have a better time waking up with the light turning on before the actual alarm. The only reasons why it's not perfect is because the speakers for the sound, sounds old school. The set up instructions could be better. The other thing is you have to press the alarm button everyday because it doesn't have a setting for repeating on certain days or during weekdays. But the price is fair and it does what I need it to make my morning ok so, it will make do.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock. I usually wake up with the light before the waves (what sound i use) wake me up. Never use a regular clock again. One thing I would change - the sounds stops after 1-2 minutes. So if i am in a very deep sleep occasionally sleep thru the alarm. Not the best thing when you need to be up on time. Change it so the alarm doesn't go off till I shut it off and would have the perfect alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Silver_Sabretooth

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one and then another for my husband shortly ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one and then another for my husband shortly after. This really does work well. I have two complaints. One - I wish it had more colors. It just has white and dark green. Two - I wish it could play sound to fall asleep to as opposed to just when it goes off in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this clock with high hopes. But so frustrated that simply setting time and alarm and having it ring reliably are almost impossible. Every so often it seems to freeze up for no reason with the central sun button and light staying on.
customer_reviews.author: tanvi

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality, broke almost immediatly, and you can't return it!!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product I wasn't expecting anything fancy so I was pleased with it at 1st. I think many people who gave it 5 stars did so right after they got it. Long story short, the one I bought quit working properly after a month. It would not stay on unless the usb was being pressed very hard into the port. I tried batteries but those did nothing. Sound quality/options are "meh" and adjusting the settings can be a pain in the rear. Spend your money else where.
customer_reviews.author: Thisisapublicprofilename

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I gave it away... I am a truck driver and it is to hard to reset the timezone every night... if u live in a house I whould defo get this, it makes light wen it is time to get up ;)
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: No manual in mine
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I didn't get a manual so I have yet to get it to save the alarm time and keep getting woken up at midnight. Anyone with an manual care to screen shots some pictures for me?? ****** Update. I emailed info@mosche.net and got a next day reply with the directions
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This just seems terribly cheap. The alarms/songs that play sound so extremely muffled and old like they're from a 1998 Nokia. I love the color concept and the sunrise/sunset functions, but that's about all it has going for it. Not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KDubs322

customer_reviews.title: Light function a plus.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says its supposed to. The volume of the alarm and the rate at which it plays in the morning is just annoying enough for me to stop snoozing and begin my day. The only issue I had with this device is that sometimes the touch functionality of the buttons did not register what I wanted it to. Otherwise, great alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Kim

customer_reviews.title: It hit the garbage then next morning
customer_reviews.text: The wake up light didn't work. The led time display is small and was hard to read from across a large room. I had the clock for about 7 months when the clock went crazy. It lite up brightly in the middle of the night, but no alarm was set. A few minutes later the alarm sounded and could not be shut off (I can only guess because no alarm was actually set). Unplugging didn't help because the battery back-up was about the only thing that did work. Had to pull the batteries out to make it stop. It hit the garbage then next morning. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: San P

customer_reviews.title: ... expect to have the light be so bright and painful on the eyes while I tried to unsuccessfully figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect to have the light be so bright and painful on the eyes while I tried to unsuccessfully figure out how to turn it off in the morning and before the alarm goes off. No matter how many times I hit the button or held it, the light stays on or suddenly gets really bright while you're looking right at it. And don't like how I can't choose to not have the light with the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for night owls who have to get up early!
customer_reviews.text: After I had a schedule change, I have to get up very early and where we live its often dark well into the morning in winter. This alarm clock has SAVED the day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Durand

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program - cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tune - sound not good - very difficult to set alarm. Also cheaply made..fell apart 1st time fell off night stand.
customer_reviews.author: BCP

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that you cant set it to snooze for more ...
customer_reviews.text: a lot of money for this... I don't care for the alarm part. I don't like that you cant set it to snooze for more then 5 mins. its cheaply made. I could see $15 but not $30 buttons can be hard to use like it doesn't read that you are pressing them... not impressed
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock. The radio has clear sound and the sunrise light colors are nice. However, none of the buttons on the back are working . So, I cannot change volume, intensity of the display, 12-24H time format or hear any of the nature sounds. I will have to either exchange or return this clock.
customer_reviews.author: jexska

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it, and get up on their own now ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, and get up on their own now -- a gentle, gradual awakening. Plus, if your kids like a little light in their rooms, these have a nice, soft glow in multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth any price.
customer_reviews.text: Directions are easy to understand. Design is very stable. Buttons rarely work. You must push repeatedly to get results. Skips over numbers or doesn’t advance or subtract.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: Finally, alarm clock that works: it goes off on time, all buttons are actually sensible to touch and, as a bonus, instructions are clear and concise. The only improvement I'd suggest would be to allow starting sunset simulation immediately just by pressing a button, without having to go through programming the alarm time.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Batarin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love for it to wake me up with the simulated sunrise. The bird noises are so much more pleasant than the screeching traditional alarm at 6AM. It took me a while to learn how to work it but now I can't live wihtout it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can not make it work properly.  Don
customer_reviews.text: I have three sunrise alarm clocks and this is the worst. It is so complicated to set up I can't make it work properly and the wake up music is just the worse. Do not buy this one. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: H Passos

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it anymore the directions and how it works is very vague it any at all. It only has one alarm. Frankly I need more than one also it doesn't go off more than once either.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you’re not entirely awake
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are hard to use, it’s basically a touch screen so you can’t feel where the buttons are. Not good if you’re not entirely awake. You can only hit snooze 5 times before the alarm turns off. It’s easy to accidentally turn the alarm off instead of hitting snooze. I have overslept many times using this.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The only thing I don't like is how ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The only thing I don't like is how it also plays music/sounds when the alarm goes off. I would prefer to just have the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The main issue with it is that the nature sounds are not very good, and the speaker quality although is loud not ...
customer_reviews.text: The alarm clock is OK. The main issue with it is that the nature sounds are not very good, and the speaker quality although is loud not very clear/crisp sound. The light is waking me up, and i really like the feature that lets you turn the time display light off. I can't stand waking up in the middle of the night knowing what time it is. So far not a bad clock programming the radio is a bit difficult but i did not by it for that so it really does not mater to me. I purchased it because i have such a difficult time waking in the winter time and hope that the light theory works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... alarm and the lowest light you can set is pretty bright. I like my room to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: You can only set one alarm and the lowest light you can set is pretty bright. I like my room to be very dark when I sleep so I figured this would work well for me since the light would gently wake you up - not the case. The light just turns on and blinds you. I tried it for too long (hoping I would get used to the product) and now I can't return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The light is nice for a child. Had to get out the manual every time I had to change something. Gave the unit away after six months.
customer_reviews.author: joe wagner

customer_reviews.title: My friend said all the alarm sounds sound bad and it is not a pleasant sound to wake ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present. My friend said all the alarm sounds sound bad and it is not a pleasant sound to wake you up in the morning. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sa_Ni

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first but now light doesn’t turn on when supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working. Lights goes on at wrong time. Too late to return which is sad.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to program and hard to operate. I gave it away!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother! Sound quality is horrendous. It's very cheaply made. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love love waking up to this! So much more peaceful than an annoying phone alarm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for teenager.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage son who has a really hard time getting up for school. He loves it. The light alarm feature is great and helps get him up by lighting up the room while playing music. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J McClaren

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great alarm clock. Very loud and very bright. I usually wake up by the light before the sound of the alarm even goes off. Only con is that the buttons are not illuminated and are flush with the face of the alarm. There’s no way to see what buttons to press when you are in the dark unless you’ve learned exactly where to press. In my half asleep daze, I find myself hitting 2 or 3 buttons before I can finally turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: FolkingLauren

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She thinks it's just OK. She wants more sound options and better sound ..overall. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Obey Bae

customer_reviews.title: Nice, soothing, non abrasive.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it says it is. I got this for my 6 year old for her birthday. It has pretty lights and pretty sounds. Win!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The face fell off of the alarm clock within a ...
customer_reviews.text: The face fell off of the alarm clock within a week. It’s cheaply made and the setup is challenging. I ended up splurging and buying the Phillips alarm instead. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brittin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what all those pretty color lights are advertising, no pretty colors here. Just the natural white and an obnoxious green that I can’t figure out why one would use. And the volume is awful. Set on 1, the lowest option and I fear it’ll wake the whole house. And a pain to set. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use in low light. Buttons are not backlit. 2 different areas with buttons is confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Amina T.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2-3 months
customer_reviews.text: This lamp/clock is good at first. I bought back in mid September of 2017. We’re in late December and the buttons on the front gave out. No light, no radio, no functionality, so if you find a time to wake up at, make sure it’s permanent because you can’t do anything else after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Poor speaker quality
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be consistently plug on. I thought it has in-built battery that use UPS cable to charge. When the light get to level 8 brightness, it starts to have a high pitch sound. Poor speaker quality. I recently I found out it missed the alarm from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Yi_Lin Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: The alarm can't be made silent. It's difficult to set the time. The clock display is really bright even on it's low setting. I'll be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No auto-off for alarm audio after period of time
customer_reviews.text: "nature sounds" are very artificial and tinny. No "auto-off" for alarm after certain period of time - I've forgotten to turn off the alarm for overnights away and when I come back in the morning it's on (OOPS).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: this alarm clock really does what it says, it wakes you up gently! I was one to sleep through my alarm before or I'd cut it off and not even know it (new mom tiredness). Now I'm waking up a couple of minutes before it goes off. I don't like that the radio even with a volume of 1 is loud and you have to "scroll" through the higher volumes before you get back to the lower volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Love its clean, beautiful and modern look. The sounds and radio are clear and volume adjusts. All features easy enough to use although I admit I had to read the directions several times.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Light is too bright (yes it's on the lowest setting) so 1/2 hour before my alarm is set I'm awake. Can't shut this off. The alarm sound won't stay set, so it always defaults to #1 and has never worked on another sound. Hard to set times as won't toggle between hour and minute easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grewe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and light but I enjoy the light gradually coming on in the morning before ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and light but I enjoy the light gradually coming on in the morning before its time for me to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but it is not easy to program. The touch buttons are not very responsive and not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: George Yu

customer_reviews.title: Too Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use, sounds are very cheap, light is bright and does help wake up, starts dim and gets brighter. Sound is very generic, I find it very complicated to set time, date, radio......
customer_reviews.author: Vikki M. Sessano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as a nice night light if needed. The light option will likely not wake you up though
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: It broke early and is cheap
customer_reviews.text: It broke (stopped reaching full brightness) within a week. Seems cheaply made. I recommend not buying this or any similar products on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: The Reverend Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The progressive light feature is nice, but the lowest volume setting is very loud for the music. It is also unecessarily difficult to change settings, turn off the alarm and set the alarm both due to the mechanism used and the lack of sensitivity in the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this clock for my 4 year old son. The sunset feature has been wonderful during bedtime. Many reviews of this product sound fake so just wanted to add my real prospective. Great product for the price. Very happy with the purchase and probably going to purchase more of them as Christmas Gifts
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Lynch

customer_reviews.title: New Age alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I love it it’s better than a regular really odd noise to wake up to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. It's a bit difficult to set. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It's a bit difficult to set. I still can't figure out several of the functions. Not thrilled but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: emehta2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Works great but also when it's not supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Randomly gets bright in the middle of the night and wakes you up. After that it's pretty much impossible to turn it off. I ended up unplugging it and after the fourth night of being rudely awakened I haven't plugged it back up

customer_reviews.title: Cool Alarm clock you must have one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this digital clock very much! It has many functions. After using this alarm clock I feel a positive mood in the morning and also evening! I recommend this lovely clock to all my friends!

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but it just wasn't bright enough for me. I returned it and opted for a 200 lumen model instead. It's worth the extra few bucks.

customer_reviews.title: the clock became useless. I wonder if it is even recyclable

customer_reviews.title: but the sound quality is not very good. The light is not as bright as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but the sound quality is not very good. The light is not as bright as I expected it to be. I also expected it to change multiple colors, but only changed to the sunlight/dim yellow, green, and off. Maybe that is in the product specs, but oh well. Might return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very cool idea- figured it would help me be a better morning person! The different variations of sounds that came with it was so much better than the generic beeping! Plus, the company was awesome helping me with any issues that I had. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyncool

customer_reviews.title: But the biggest drawback is that the snooze feature will stop after snoozing a few times -- terrible for heavy sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Setting the alarm is a bit tricky, as it is a pain to have it change the time. But the biggest drawback is that the snooze feature will stop after snoozing a few times -- terrible for heavy sleepers.

product_meta.title: Mosche Sunrise Alarm Clock, Digital Clock, Wake Up Light with 6 Nature Sounds, FM Radio and Touch Control (White)
feature_bullets: Sunrise/Sunset Simulation -- The wake up light will be on from 1% of the brightness to 100% at set time to bring you out of deep sleep gently to welcome a refreshed day; And Sunset function will guide you to natural, restful sleep.

6 Natural Sounds & FM Radio -- 6 natural sounds such as pure music, birds, forest, waves, beeping and so on, which let you revel in the sounds and smells of the nature. As well as FM radio, if you don't want to wake up, you can choose your favorite sound.
7 Colors Light & Mood Light Mode -- Choosing your favorite color light: warm white/green/red/blue/purple/orange/indigo. And 10 adjustable brightness settings as a bedside lamp to protect your eyes.

3 Charging Methods -- Power this useful gadget with a USB charger(Only power this device) or a wall jack, there is an option to use back up 3x AAA batteries (AAA batteries Not included). We suggest that using the batteries and the USB cord together in case of resetting the time when the cord gets disconnected.
You Will Get -- 1* Wake Up Light, 1* USB Cable,1* 5V/1A Adapter & 1 Year Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars427 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
